subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Drexel’s Nicole Hester was named the winner of the Honda Inspiration Award after she beat cancer and helped lead the team to its first N.C.A.A. tournament appearance. The award honors a female college athlete who has overcome adversity to excel in her sport. Hodgkin’s lymphoma was diagnosed in the fall of 2006. Hester returned to play the last two years, and as a senior, Hester helped the Dragons dethrone Old Dominion in the Colonial Athletic Association tournament semifinals.
